entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Block Jam Blast For Watch
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí $0.99 ($0.99 ~ $1.99)Ôºâ

Application Description

Block Jam Blaster: Ultimate Tile-Puzzling Fun on iWatch Craving a quick, brain-boosting escape during your bustling day?¬†Block Jam Blaster¬†is your go-to iWatch puzzle game‚Äîdesigned for instant play on your wrist, blending simple controls with strategic depth to keep you hooked! Three Challenges, One Grid‚ÄîMaster the Art of Placement Choose your path across three difficulty tiers, all set on the same grid but with escalating tile complexity: ‚Ä¢ Casual: Start with clean, straightforward tiles (squares, lines) to ease into the rhythm. Perfect for unwinding and racking up quick points. ‚Ä¢ Strategy: Tackle angled and jagged shapes (L-Tiles, T-Tiles). Plan placements carefully to clear rows/columns and avoid gridlock‚Äîevery move counts! ‚Ä¢ Extreme: Face chaotic, asymmetrical tiles that demand split-second decisions. Only the sharpest minds can chain combos and dominate the high-score board! How to Play: Drag, Plan, and Blast! ‚Ä¢ Drag & Drop Tiles: Strategically position tiles to fill entire rows or columns. Watch them vanish with a satisfying¬†pop¬†and earn points‚Äîclear multiple lines at once for massive multipliers! ‚Ä¢ Smart Scoring: Every placement matters. The game ends when no space is left, so think ahead to maximize combos and minimize waste. Why Block Jam Blaster? ‚Ä¢ Immersive Audio Feedback: Crisp sound effects enhance every tile elimination, making each blast feel wildly rewarding. ‚Ä¢ Play Anytime, Anywhere: No Wi-Fi? No problem. Enjoy offline play during commutes, coffee breaks, or whenever you need a quick mental boost. Download now¬†and turn fleeting moments into triumphs of strategy! Train your brain, crush high scores, and discover why Block Jam Blaster is a must-have for iWatch gamers worldwide.

entry.title: Only You Are Here
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.49 ‚Üí $0.29 ($0.29 ~ $0.49)Ôºâ

Application Description

The Secret Elevator Remastered ‚Äî an atmospheric adventure with first-person horror elements. Take on the role of a person trapped inside their dream. This place is filled with a mix of memories and nightmares. To get out, you have to open a small door. Immerse yourself in the game's history, walk through many endings, and discover the key secret.
